metadata.name: Dua for entering the cemetary - I.  Sadiq

arabic: اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَى اَهْلِ الدِّيَارِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَالْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
وَنَحْنُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ بِكُمْ لاَحِقُونَ
translation: Peace upon the inhabitants of these graves from amongst the believers and the Muslims
and we if God wishes will join you
transliteration: as salāmu `alā ahlid diyāri minal mu-minīna walmuslimīn
